label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_011
content:

#### cloud-dns-sync-01

#### signer-01
- CPU Percentage: 35
- Memory Percentage: 72
- Disk Used Percentage: 61
- Net In (Mbps): 16
- Net Out (Mbps): 20
- HSM Slot Utilization Percentage: 60
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

### Events
- Migrated 16 zones with DNSSEC enabled from day one; verified DS publishing order and validated from external resolvers.
- Adjusted monitoring to include per-zone propagation SLO and stale answer sampling; initial baselines captured.
- Removed legacy allow-transfer ACL entries on BIND master for retired slaves; confirmed no unintended AXFR blocks for cloud endpoints.
- Reviewed negative caching behavior; tuned SOA minimum values for 5 zones to reduce prolonged NXDOMAIN caching after record creation.

### On Call
- Shift: P. Singh
- Pages: 1
- Tickets: 5
- Status: Stable; successful DNSSEC-enabled migrations and improved monitoring coverage.
